alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Indian River, south central Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Blue Cypress Lake, movement nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blue Cypress Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Osceola
